channel.title: CVE Feed for vsourz1td -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vsourz1td -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-3723|2024-07-12T19:39:27.213Z -- vsourz1td -- advanced%20contact%20form%207%20db
item.description: The Advanced Contact form 7 DB plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 2.0.2 via the wp-content/uploads/advanced-cf7-upload directory. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data uploaded via this plugin through a form.

item.title: CVE-2024-3723|2024-06-11T05:33:40.801Z -- vsourz1td -- advanced%20contact%20form%207%20db
item.description: The Advanced Contact form 7 DB plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 2.0.2 via the wp-content/uploads/advanced-cf7-upload directory. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data uploaded via this plugin through a form.

item.title: CVE-2024-4319|2024-06-11T13:37:04.519Z -- vsourz1td -- advanced%20contact%20form%207%20db
item.description: The Advanced Contact form 7 DB plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the 'vsz_cf7_export_to_excel' function in versions up to, and including, 2.0.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to download the entry data for submitted forms.
